alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 2:04AM CDT until March 12 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... Southern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 104 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Indianola to near Hollandale to 6 miles east of Jones, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hollandale, Delta City, Panther Burn and Nitta Yuma around 110 AM CST. Murphy around 115 AM CST. Swiftown and Midnight around 130 AM CST. Shelburn around 135 AM CST. Lake Providence around 140 AM CST. Tchula around 150 AM CST. Yazoo City around 155 AM CST. Benton, Lexington, Fitler, Onward and Howard around 300 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mayersville, Silver City, West, Eden, Kilbourne, Cary, Louise and Cruger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
